vision.notes: Likely present as they are freshwater fish, but details are unknown from the provided context. Further research is needed to determine visual acuity and spectral sensitivity.

hearing.notes: Hearing capabilities are unknown based on the provided context. Further research needed.

chemoreception.notes: Chemoreception (taste and smell) is likely present in freshwater fish, but no details are available in the provided text. Further research needed.

electroreception.notes: Electroreception is generally rare in freshwater fish, and there is no evidence in the text that Cyprinidae possess this sense. Further research needed.
